resources.name: TUNAX API - Complete
resources.description: Tunisian Tax System - All Endpoints | Demo Password: TunaxDemo123! | TIB Categories: 1(≤100m²), 2(101-200m²), 3(201-400m²), 4(>400m²) | Service Rates: 1-2→8%, 3-4→10%, 5-6→12%, 7+→14%

resources.name: Login (demo_citizen)
Me
My Properties
My Lands
My TIB Taxes
Estimate Tax (TIB)
resources.description: Estimate TIB for a property. System auto-determines category from covered surface (≤100→Cat1, ≤200→Cat2, ≤400→Cat3, >400→Cat4) and service rate from available services (1-2→8%, 3-4→10%, 5-6→12%, 7+→14%)

resources.name: Estimate Tax (TTNB - Land)
resources.description: Estimate TTNB (land tax) for agricultural or non-agricultural land

resources.name: Login
resources.description: Demo users: demo_citizen, demo_business, demo_agent, demo_inspector, demo_finance, demo_contentieux, demo_urbanism, demo_admin (MUNICIPAL_ADMIN), ministry_admin - All password: TunaxDemo123!

body.text: {"commission_decision":"Submitted for review by Commission de révision"}
{"reason":"Decision does not consider updated market values and recent property improvements"}

resources.name: Update Reference Price - Cat 1
resources.description: Set exact reference price for Category 1 (≤100 m²). Must be within legal bounds 100-178 TND/m²

resources.name: Update Reference Price - Cat 2
resources.description: Set exact reference price for Category 2 (101-200 m²). Must be within legal bounds 163-238 TND/m²

resources.name: Update Reference Price - Cat 3
resources.description: Set exact reference price for Category 3 (201-400 m²). Must be within legal bounds 217-297 TND/m²

resources.name: Update Reference Price - Cat 4
resources.description: Set exact reference price for Category 4 (>400 m²). Must be within legal bounds 271-356 TND/m²

resources.name: Get Reference Price Bounds
resources.description: Get legal min/max bounds for all 4 TIB categories (≤100, 101-200, 201-400, >400 m²)

resources.name: Update Reference Price Bounds - Cat 1
resources.description: Update legal bounds for Category 1 (≤100 m²). Existing municipal prices will be clamped to new range.

resources.name: Update Reference Price Bounds - Cat 2
resources.description: Update legal bounds for Category 2 (101-200 m²)

resources.name: Update Reference Price Bounds - Cat 3
resources.description: Update legal bounds for Category 3 (201-400 m²)

resources.name: Update Reference Price Bounds - Cat 4
resources.description: Update legal bounds for Category 4 (>400 m²)
